EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Cleave Attack: Sheathe your weapon in eldritch energies, striking foes in front of you for +1[W] damage. If this attack hits, your weapon also releases a blast of magical energy, dealing an additional 0 to 2 Force Damage per character level to all nearby foes. This additional Force damage is affected by your Force Spell Power. (Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points. Cooldown: 15 seconds) Passive: Every point spend in the Eldritch Knight tree grants you +0.5 Universal Spell Power. +1% doublestrike

Effect.DisplayName: Eldritch Knight: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Spellsword I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Charge your equipped weapon with magical (element), causing them to deal an addtional 1d6 (element) damage on hit. This damage increases to 2d4 at Sorcerer Level 6, 3d4 at Sorcerer Level 12, and 4d4 at Sorcerer Level 18. Up to once every 6 seconds while a spellsword toggle is active, an attack you make that hits an enemy will cost you a spell point. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals an additional 0 to 2 (element) damage per character level. This additional damage is affected by your (element) spellpower. Passive: -5% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor and Shields +10 Force Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellsword: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: Toggle: Charge your equipped weapon with magical Acid, causing them to deal an addtional 1d6 Acid damage on hit. This damage increases to 2d4 at Sorcerer Level 6, 3d4 at Sorcerer Level 12, and 4d4 at Sorcerer Level 18. Passive: -5% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor and Shields +10 Force Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Strike now grants you a Power Charge. When you have 10 Power Charges, they are removed, and you gain Eldritch Power. Eldritch Power: +10% melee damage, +25 Universal spellpower. Passive: +2 Charisma +10 Force spellpower

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Mage Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Mage Armor. (Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points) In addition, while you are under the effect of the Mage Armor spell, you gain a +3%/+6%/+10% increase to your total Armor Class.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5/+10/+15 maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Battlemage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Intimidate, and Spellcraft.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shield (Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell points) In addition, while you are under the effect of the Shield spell, you gain +3/+6/+10 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Shield Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency with all shields except Tower Shields, and your Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped shields is reduced by 5%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Light Armor Proficiency
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Light Armor, and your total Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped armor is reduced by 5%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Martial Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +2% doublestrike and proficiency with all martial weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25%/+50%/+75% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +1/+2/+3 to the save DC of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Barrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: When your HP drop below 50% of maximum, you are immediately protected by an Arcane Barrier that reduces all incoming damage by 25% for the next 10/15/20 seconds. This effect may only trigger once every 150/120/90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Elemental Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +2/+4/+6 Resistance to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Critical Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1/+2/+3 to attack rolls to confirm critical hits.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Shield Striking
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On Hit: +5%/+10%/+15% chance to proc an immediate Shield Bash attack with an equipped shield

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Medium Armor Proficiency
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Medium Armor, and your total Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped armor is reduced by an additional 5%

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Critical Damage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1/+2/+3 to damage on critical hits (before weapon multipliers).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Tenser's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Gain the benefits and penalties of Tenser's Transformation (Activation Cost: 25 Spell Points)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Every six seconds while you have a shield equipped, you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to the enhancement bonus of your equipped shield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Still Spell
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Your Arcane Spell Failure from equipped armor and shields is reduced by 5%/10%/15%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Doublestrike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1%/+2%/+3% Doublestrike

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Perform a spinning melee attack, dealing weapon damage +2[W] to all nearby enemies and knocking them prone for 1 second. (Activation Cost: 50/40/30 Spell points. Cooldown: 60/45/30 seconds) If any foes are struck by Eldritch Tempest, your weapon also releases an explosion of magical force, dealing an additional 1d6 Force damage per character level to all nearby enemies. This additional force damage is affected by your spell power.
